headline: Here's Why Investors Should Bet on Wabtec Stock Right Now
summary: Wabtec is bolstered by an uptick in market demand, driving backlog growth. The company's shareholder-friendly initiatives are also commendable.

headline: Wabtec Gears Up to Report Q1 Earnings: Here's What to Expect
summary: Wabtec's first-quarter bottom line is expected to have been hurt by escalated operating expenses.

headline: Seeking Clues to Wabtec (WAB) Q1 Earnings? A Peek Into Wall Street Projections for Key Metrics
summary: Looking beyond Wall Street's top -and-bottom-line estimate forecasts for Wabtec (WAB), delve into some of its key metrics to gain a deeper insight into the company's potential performance for the quarter ended March 2025.
